TopicTitle: The mission is not fulfilled - Return to Kerbin with the object: Stone on the Moon (Muna)

Articles.Content:
Hello!
How many times did not try, I still can not fulfill this contract. And looking for from the desired biome. And I return it in a container for science, it still does not count.
Help! 
The mission is not fulfilled - Return to Kerbin with the object: Stone on the Moon (Muna)

4 hours ago, nar10z said:

Hello!
How many times did not try, I still can not fulfill this contract. And looking for from the desired biome. And I return it in a container for science, it still does not count.
Help! 
The mission is not fulfilled - Return to Kerbin with the object: Stone on the Moon (Muna)

 

Did you find an actual stone on the moon, and stand your Kerbal next to or on it, and right click your Kerbal and pick it up?

5 hours ago, 5thHorseman said:

Did you find an actual stone on the moon, and stand your Kerbal next to or on it, and right click your Kerbal and pick it up?

Yes i did it

3 hours ago, nar10z said:

Yes i did it

Then alt-f12 and complete the contract.

 

Edited July 20, 2019 by 5thHorseman

I have never gotten these missions to complete.  I have tried many variations from rovers, to landers, with the lander actually returning to Kerbin never having docked with any other ship, all to no avail.  I have also never gotten the scanning missions to complete. If the root part that gathered the stone is required, then.. that would be the Kerbal's legs?  So.. take the science from the capsule and EVA back on Kerbin, then recover and then maybe it would work?  I will have to try that. Seems pretty stupid to me.

Alt F12 is the only way I've been able to finish these types of missions.
